a.detail: The walls here have been engraved with strange symbols
a.summary: The walls here have been engraved with strange symbols

details.history: The dungeon was created by dwarves as a temple. It was eventually overrun by devils, and has fallen to ruin and been rebuilt many times since then.

east.desc: Secret (DC 15 to find) Unlocked Strong Wooden Door (20 hp)
east.secret: The door is located above a small stone dais and concealed behind an area of fungus

north.desc: Secret (DC 25 to find) Unlocked Simple Wooden Door (10 hp)
north.secret: The door is concealed by an illusion

north.desc: Locked Strong Wooden Door (DC 15 to open, DC 20 to break; 20 hp)

south.desc: Trapped and Stuck Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to break; 10 hp)
south.trap:
Falling Block: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 12 save or take 2d10 damage

south.desc: Trapped and Stuck Stone Door (DC 20 to break; 60 hp)
south.trap: One-way Door: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable

detail.room_features: A narrow pit covered by iron bars lies in the south-east corner of the room, and someone has scrawled "Beware the basilisk" on the south wall

west.desc: Trapped and Stuck Iron Door (DC 25 to break; 60 hp)
west.trap:
Ice Dart Trap: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    +4 to hit against one target, 1d10 cold damage

detail.room_features: A large demonic idol with ruby eyes sits in the west side of the room, and a sundered mace lies in the center of the room

south.desc: Trapped and Stuck Stone Door (DC 20 to break; 60 hp)
south.trap:
Arrow Trap: DC 15 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    +5 to hit against one target, 1d10 piercing damage

south.desc: Locked Strong Wooden Door (DC 15 to open, DC 20 to break; 20 hp)

monster: Silver Dragon Wyrmling (cr 2, mm 118); deadly, 450 xp
Treasure: 3300 cp, 700 sp, 60 gp, 3 x diamond (50 gp), chalcedony (50 gp), citrine (50 gp), onyx (50 gp), sardonyx (50 gp)

Falling Block: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 12 save or take 2d10 damage

west.trap:
Magic Missle Trap: DC 20 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    one target, 1d10 force damage

trap:
Falling Block: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 15 save or take 2d10 damage

north.desc: Trapped and Stuck Stone Door (DC 20 to break; 60 hp)
north.trap:
Rune of Fear: DC 15 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects all targets within 10 ft., DC 14 save or become frightened for 1d4 rounds

settings.name: The Sanctum of the Lich Princess

wandering_monsters.1: Silver Dragon Wyrmling (cr 2, mm 118); deadly, 450 xp, searching for an object stolen from their lair
wandering_monsters.2: Gelatinous Cube (cr 2, mm 242); deadly, 450 xp, actively patrolling their territory
wandering_monsters.3: Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166) and 1 x Wolf (cr 1/4, mm 341); easy, 100 xp, lost and desperate
wandering_monsters.4: Gelatinous Cube (cr 2, mm 242); deadly, 450 xp, wielding bizarre eldritch powers
wandering_monsters.5: 4 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); deadly, 200 xp, trying to lure the party into an ambush
wandering_monsters.6: Orog (cr 2, mm 247); deadly, 450 xp, trying to lure the party into an ambush
